title: Broadleaf Cigarettes Slide and Shell Pack w/ Original Cigarettes For Sale - Price Added
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Broadleaf Cigarettes Slide and Shell Pack w/ Original Cigarettes For Sale - Price Added
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jon Canfield
For those of you that collect cigarette packs, this needs no introduction.  Quite possibly Broadleaf is the rarest cigarette pack of all of the T-206 brands.  I’ve recently acquired a second Broadleaf that I am offering for sale.  The cigarette pack is in amazing condition and, to the best of my knowledge, the finest copy out there.

The pack is a 15 count cigarette pack.  It is from Factory 25, 2nd District of Virginia.  Amazingly, it still retains 10+ of it’s original cigarettes.  However, the pack does not have a tax stamp for closer dating.  Furthermore, there is no reference to the ATC or L&M on the pack.  Based on the 15 count cigarette configuration, I believe this pack dates from 1910 – 1917 which I have confirmed with a few others.  It is impossible for me to speculate as to which year it dates however there is a possibility it is from the T206 distribution era although I do not have any definitive proof to say so for sure.  If interested, please email me for pricing.

posts.post_title: Broadleaf Cigarettes Slide and Shell Pack w/ Original Cigarettes For Sale - Price Added
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jon Canfield
In order to make room for some Mastro pick-ups, I am putting a price of $950 on the Broadleaf pack.  Also, I'd be willing to list on eBay with a BIN so that the purchaser can get a reduced price using the Microsoft Live feature.  I'd also listen to cash-trade offers.
